input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product title.

Product title:
AC Compressor w/A/C Repair Kit For Lexus ES300 1994 1995 1996 1997 1998 1999 - BuyAutoParts 60-80129RK NEW

Product keywords:
Guaranteed Exact Fit for easy installation
100% BRAND NEW, premium ISO/TS 16949 quality - tested to meet or exceed OEM specifications
Engineered for superior durability, backed by industry leading warranty
Included in this KIT: 100% BRAND NEW premium quality A/C compressor with clutch ; New accumulator / receiver drier / desiccant ; New expansion device ; Complete vehicle-specific o-ring seal kit ; correct viscosity PAG oil

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Guaranteed to fit your 1994-1999 Lexus ES300 like a glove and provide superior performance with exceptional durability, this AC Compressor & A/C Repair Kit is backed by our industry leading warranty.

This AC Compressor & A/C Repair Kit is a direct replacement for your Lexus and will install just like the original. This AC Compressor & A/C Repair Kit is built to surpass your expectations.

This AC Compressor & A/C Repair Kit is built using high-quality materials and to strict quality control standards.
input_text.Response B: This brand new AC Compressor with AC repair kit is suited for various Lexus ES300 models from 1994 through 1999.  The easy installation kit is premium ISO/TS 16949 quality tested to meet or exceed the original equipment manufacturer specifications.  The Kit includes 5 parts - Brand new AC compressor with clutch, new accumulator/receiver drier / desiccant, new expansion device, vehicle specific set of o-rings and bottle of compressor oil and has been engineered for superior durability.
